name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-oriented professional with 8 years of experience as a Full Stack Developer transitioning into a Senior Mathematician Engineer role. Proven expertise in **AI**, **Mathematics**, and **Data Labeling**, with a strong analytical mindset to evaluate models effectively. Proficient in **Programming** using **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter** to build high-performance solutions, ensuring comprehensive problem-solving and communication skills throughout the development process.

Skilled in full-stack development leveraging **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, with experience in cloud services such as **Azure** and **AWS**. I have developed enterprise-grade platforms that integrate machine learning capabilities for predictive analytics and real-time data processing, enhancing decision-making by ensuring effective **Model Evaluation** and implementing robust test procedures.

My technical background includes a solid understanding of microservices architecture, event-driven systems, CI/CD automation, and compliance with industry standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, and PCI DSS. Additionally, I bring hands-on experience in developing machine learning pipelines and implementing MLOps workflows using tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**, ensuring that I adapt complex technical requirements into practical applications seamlessly.
